nl.inl.blacklab.search

Interface Pausible

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ThreadPauser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThreadPauserImpl

    public interface Pausible

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isPaused()
      Is this operation currently paused?
      void pause(boolean pause)
      Pause or unpause this operation.

    • Method Detail

      • pause

        void pause(boolean pause)
        Pause or unpause this operation. This can be used to stop a heavy search from consuming CPU resources when other users are waiting. Pausing actually amounts to "proceeding very slowly".
        Parameters:
        pause - if true, pause the operation; if false, unpause it

      • isPaused

        boolean isPaused()
        Is this operation currently paused?
        Returns:
        true if operation is paused, false if not
